content: > you can purchase the ad-free > printable pdf of this pattern at the > link above or you can access the > free version on my blog here > https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/2018/10/make-this-basic-v_stitch-scarf-for-donation-projects html i received a request from a fellow crocheter for a v_stitch scarf pattern using the double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet stitch this is a beginner level scarf pattern and all you need is medium weight yarn 4 and a 5 5 mm i hook i created a step-by-step video to get you started and the written pattern is also available for free on my blog video link https //youtu be/d_rgoezecvm have fun crocheting and i hope this pattern helps those of you who are making your donation scarves this year best wishes rhondda xx
